page.title: 18INVERURIE BY-PASS
page.content:
The proposed route of the by-pass will remove 3 or 4 holes on the golf course. The members of the golf club objected to this quite naturally, but new ground is being made available to compensate for this.
The by-pass also involves the demolition of Mount Pleasant, a house in Port Elphinstone. The owner of the house has objected quite strongly as it is felt that it could be re-routed slightly to avoid this.
The by-pass will only remove an estimated 1/4 of the traffic in Inverurie and some people feel that it is not worth the expense and the nuisance factor. Shopkeepers feel that their trade will be affected with less passing trade.
